Package com.linkedin.alpini.base.misc

Class MemoryPressureIndexMonitor<T,​K,​S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linkedin.alpini.base.misc.MemoryPressureIndexMonitor<T,​K,​S>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The referent that contains bytes information, for example, an HttpRequest that has Content-Length in its header
    K - The Key used by internal map to keep track of byte count by objects.
    S - The Stats
    public class MemoryPressureIndexMonitor<T,​K,​S>
extends java.lang.Object
    Monitor using the size of live objects, byte-based to indicate memory pressure.
